Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' compared to the frequency of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' that eventually lead to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of times 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' is immediately followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurring in variants that include re-submission cycles (i.e., repeated 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' relative to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' appears more than once in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' events associated with declaration amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' that occur before any approval step (e.g., before 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', or 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that do not contain 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', to assess indirect impact on the goal
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of total rejections by administration that result in eventual successful reimbursement (i.e., end with 'Payment Handled')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' to total number of declarations submitted ('Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of process instances where 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' is the final activity (i.e., no subsequent resubmission)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that also contain 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' occurring in 2017 versus 2018, based on event timestamps (inferred from case identifiers or context)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases
